Tesselation Class Reference
Patches » Elements

The Tesselation class allows to tessalete polygons and polyhedrons. More...

Detailed Description

The Tesselation class allows to tessalete polygons and polyhedrons.

The Tesselation class allows to divde polygons and polyhedrons elements "regular" elements, i.e., elements that are associated to a reference element.

The documentation for this class was generated from the following file:
  • src/patchkernel/element.cpp
